answers.answer: Not worried at all, I failed the one hour and passed the three hour, did you fast before that test??
i mean i didnt eat the morn before, but my appt was early in the morning & i probably ate after midnight. i hope i'll be ok "/
I'm sure you will, fast during this three hour test cuz they draw blood 4 times, take snacks for after just in case your hungry! They made me stay there so I didn't burn any of that sugar off.
same here I have to go back for the 3 hour test b4 June 6 th my doc told me not to eat after midnight Idk if I will make it without. eating that long
they draw blood 4 times?? ooo god "/

I failed the 1 hour with my last pregnancy and ate before it, then passed the 2 hour (we dont have a 3 hour) so then this one i didnt eat before the 1 hour and i still failed it...and again passed the 2 hour... if i get prego again im going straight to the 2 hour fasting test! lol

question: i just got a call from my Dr.. and my results came back bad.. i have to go for the 3 hr test. i talked to the nurse yesterday before i took the test & she said a lot of people come back with false positives. i weighed 135 prepreg & now i'm at 150.. i thought i wouldnt have anything to worry about :( how worried should i be??
title: diabetes testing results :(
